lead_paragraph: McCAFFREY--Margaret A.,of East Setauket, NY on May 10, 2016 at the age of 74. Daughter of the late John and Anne (nee Bane) McCaffrey, born April 19, 1942 and raised in the Bronx, NY. Graduate of Marymount Manhattan and Hunter College. Teacher of children in the New York City public school (5 years) and the Three Village School District (30 years). Survived by her brother John (Diane) McCaffrey; two nieces, Tracy and Mary, nephew James, one great-nephew, Sean and great-nieces Kelly and Regan, all of whom she regarded as her own. Bryant Funeral Home, 411 Old Town Road, E. Setauket. Visiting Thursday, 2-4 and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass Friday, 10am, Infant Jesus RC Church, Port Jefferson. Interment at Calvary Cemetery, Woodside, NY. Memorial donations to East End Hospice. www.EEH.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCCAFFREY, MARGARET A.
